frame.name: Häkke Precision Frame
frame.description: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Confined Launch

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed.
  •  Greatly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases blast radius
perks.name: Hard Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is well-balanced.
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Linear Compensator

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
perks.name: Smart Drift Control

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description:
This weapon's explosives are more effective.
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Black Powder

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles travel faster and have a controlled explosion.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Decreases blast radius
perks.name: Implosion Rounds

perks.description:
Increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Impact Casing

perks.description: Massively increases projectile velocity, increases reload speed.
perks.name: Impulse Amplifier

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Massively increases projectile velocity, substantially increases reload speed.
perks.name: Impulse Amplifier

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Substantially increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.
perks.name: Ambitious Assassin

perks.description: Substantially improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Rockets attach on impact and detonate after a delay. Increases blast radius and damage.
perks.name: Lasting Impression

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon for an improved duration.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Rockets attach on impact and detonate after a delay. Substantially increases blast radius and increases damage.
perks.name: Lasting Impression

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon for an improved duration until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Chain Reaction

perks.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets.
perks.name: Chill Clip

perks.description: Picking up an Orb of Power increases the next projectile's blast radius and damage.
perks.name: Explosive Light

perks.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion. Improves ammo reserves.
perks.name: Chain Reaction

perks.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets. Stability is improved.
perks.name: Chill Clip

perks.description: Picking up an Orb of Power increases the next projectile's blast radius and damage. Increases projectile velocity.
perks.name: Explosive Light

perks.description: This weapon deals increased damage against vehicles, turrets, barricades, and Stasis crystals.
perks.name: Hakke Breach Armaments
